languages.text: {n}Никто из них не закоренел во грехе, потому сладость прегрешения опьяняет их. То, сколь близко они подошли в мыслях к запретному, распаляет их умы. Они не заслуживают немедленной казни... пока что. Но заслуживают ли они спасения? За что их спасать?{/n}

{n}None of them are steeped in corruption, and so the sweetness of trespassing still intoxicates them. Their minds are captivated by how close they have come to the forbidden. They have not earned an immediate execution... not yet. But do they deserve to be saved? Why save them at all?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Никто из них не закоренел во грехе, потому сладость прегрешения опьяняет их. То, сколь близко они подошли в мыслях к запретному, распаляет их умы. Они не заслуживают немедленной казни... пока что. Но заслуживают ли они спасения? За что их спасать?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}None of them are immured in transgression, so the sweetness of guilt intoxicates them. Their minds are enraptured by how close they have come to the forbidden. They do not deserve an immediate execution... not yet. But do they deserve to be saved? Why save them at all?{/n}

{n}None of them are immured in transgression, so the sweetness of guilt intoxicates them. Their minds are enraptured by how close they have come to the forbidden. They do not deserve an immediate execution... not yet. But do they deserve to be saved? Why save them at all?{/n}

{n}None of them are experienced in transgression, and so the sweetness of guilt still intoxicates them. Their minds are captivated by how close they have come to the forbidden. They have not earned an immediate execution... not yet. But do they deserve to be saved? Why save them at all?{/n}

{n}None of them are experienced in transgression, and so the sweetness of guilt still intoxicates them. Their minds are captivated by how close they have come to the forbidden. They have not earned an immediate execution... not yet. But do they deserve to be saved? Why save them at all?{/n}

{n}None of them are steeped in corruption, and so the sweetness of trespassing still intoxicates them. Their minds are captivated by how close they have come to the forbidden. They have not earned an immediate execution... not yet. But do they deserve to be saved? Why save them at all?{/n}

{n}None of them are steeped in corruption, and so the sweetness of trespassing still intoxicates them. Their minds are captivated by how close they have come to the forbidden. They have not earned an immediate execution... not yet. But do they deserve to be saved? Why save them at all?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Keiner von ihnen ist bereits korrumpiert, und deshalb kann die Süße der Grenzüberschreitung sie immer noch berauschen. Ihr Geist ist ergriffen von dem Gedanken, wie nah sie dem Verbotenen gekommen sind. Sie haben sich keine sofortige Hinrichtung verdient ... noch nicht. Aber verdienen sie es, gerettet zu werden? Warum sie überhaupt retten?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}None of them are steeped in corruption, and so the sweetness of trespassing still intoxicates them. Their minds are captivated by how close they have come to the forbidden. They have not earned an immediate execution... not yet. But do they deserve to be saved? Why save them at all?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Keiner von ihnen ist bereits korrumpiert, und deshalb kann die Süße der Grenzüberschreitung sie immer noch berauschen. Ihr Geist ist ergriffen von dem Gedanken, wie nah sie dem Verbotenen gekommen sind. Sie haben sich keine sofortige Hinrichtung verdient ... noch nicht. Aber verdienen sie es, gerettet zu werden? Warum sie überhaupt retten?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ninguno de ellos está sumido en la corrupción, y, por tanto, la dulzura de la transgresión les resulta embriagadora. Sus mentes están cautivadas por la cercanía de lo prohibido. No se han ganado una ejecución inmediata... por ahora. Pero ¿merecen la salvación? ¿Para qué salvarlos?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}None of them are steeped in corruption, and so the sweetness of trespassing still intoxicates them. Their minds are captivated by how close they have come to the forbidden. They have not earned an immediate execution... not yet. But do they deserve to be saved? Why save them at all?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ninguno de ellos está sumido en la corrupción, y, por tanto, la dulzura de la transgresión les resulta embriagadora. Sus mentes están cautivadas por la cercanía de lo prohibido. No se han ganado una ejecución inmediata... por ahora. Pero ¿merecen la salvación? ¿Para qué salvarlos?{/n}

languages.text: {n}誰も腐敗に染まっておらず、侵入したという甘さにまだ酔いしれている。彼らの心は、禁断に近づいたという事実に魅了されている。すぐに処刑されるようなことはない…少なくとも今は。しかし、彼らは救済に値するのだろうか？彼らを救う理由は一体…？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}None of them are steeped in corruption, and so the sweetness of trespassing still intoxicates them. Their minds are captivated by how close they have come to the forbidden. They have not earned an immediate execution... not yet. But do they deserve to be saved? Why save them at all?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}誰も腐敗に染まっておらず、侵入したという甘さにまだ酔いしれている。彼らの心は、禁断に近づいたという事実に魅了されている。すぐに処刑されるようなことはない…少なくとも今は。しかし、彼らは救済に値するのだろうか？彼らを救う理由は一体…？{/n}

languages.text: {n}这些人并没有腐化的印记，冒犯权威的甜蜜依然能让他们沉醉不已。尽管他们的思想离已经离那条红线没多远了，但他们的罪行还并不足以让他们被立刻处决……暂时还没有。不过，这些人真的值得拯救吗？为什么要拯救他们呢？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}None of them are steeped in corruption, and so the sweetness of trespassing still intoxicates them. Their minds are captivated by how close they have come to the forbidden. They have not earned an immediate execution... not yet. But do they deserve to be saved? Why save them at all?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这些人并没有腐化的印记，冒犯权威的甜蜜依然能让他们沉醉不已。尽管他们的思想离已经离那条红线没多远了，但他们的罪行还并不足以让他们被立刻处决……暂时还没有。不过，这些人真的值得拯救吗？为什么要拯救他们呢？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aucun d'eux n'étant voué corps et âme à la corruption, la fascination de la transgression les enivre encore. Leurs esprits sont captivés par la frontière toute proche de l'interdit. Ils ne méritent pas une exécution immédiate... pas encore. Mais faut-il les sauver pour autant ? Et pourquoi faudrait-il les sauver tous ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}None of them are steeped in corruption, and so the sweetness of trespassing still intoxicates them. Their minds are captivated by how close they have come to the forbidden. They have not earned an immediate execution... not yet. But do they deserve to be saved? Why save them at all?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aucun d'eux n'étant voué corps et âme à la corruption, la fascination de la transgression les enivre encore. Et pourquoi faudrait-il les sauver tous ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yozlaşma, hiçbirinin iliklerine işlememiş. Bundandır ki sınırları çiğnemenin o tatlı hissi, onları hâlâ sarhoş ediyor. Zihinleri, yasak olana ne kadar yaklaştıkları düşüncesiyle büyülenmiş. Hızlı bir infazı hak etmediler. Daha değil... Peki kurtarılmayı hak ediyorlar mı? Neden hepsini birden kurtaralım?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}None of them are steeped in corruption, and so the sweetness of trespassing still intoxicates them. Their minds are captivated by how close they have come to the forbidden. They have not earned an immediate execution... not yet. But do they deserve to be saved? Why save them at all?{/n}
